Hey, this isn‚Äôt a healthy look on life but I‚Äôm quite sure you already know that, don‚Äôt you? 
I‚Äôm here for you, I‚Äôm here to talk.
I have been having a lot of the same type of thoughts and I have had many many dark days but even if it‚Äôs just for a second, could you listen to me.
There is always shitty things and there will forever be shitty things BUT there are also some absolutely amazing things too.
Take a look out your windows and purposefully look for something beautiful, it could be a laughing baby or a squirrel or a pretty shaped leaf floating in the wind. It could be the fresh snow or someone with red cheeks running. Look inside for the beautiful things like your favourite nicknack or cereal. It could even just be the feeling of putting on warm socks as soon as you wake up. It could just be that you love the smell of coffee or the warm water in the shower. 
Look up, look around and remind yourself that for every one bad thing there are a hundred good things, however small and seemingly insignificant they are. These are reasons to live.
There are so many reasons to live if you look.
   
   You can message me if you need to, I have a list written out for myself somewhere that if you ever need a reminder, I‚Äôm here xx
Thank you

Life is a question with one right answer but a billion wrong answers. The wrong answers are easy to find but the right answer is so much easier if you look at it the right way. Everyone contemplated the meaning of life but I think that the answer to the eternal question is just to live. Live your way, live happy, forget everything else. My friend, he was the kindest person in the world, sweet an innocent but he knew a lot about the world. It‚Äôs been almost 4 years since he died and it gets harder everyday because I can‚Äôt remember what his voice sounded like, I can‚Äôt remember what he looks like. I know his face I can describe it but I just can‚Äôt see it anymore. I remember telling him that his voice was so deep that he should play Darth Vader, but now all I can hear is Darth Vader and not him.
I don‚Äôt know..?
